item.description:
Hey there Everyone!

Chili's won out for the Food and Drink Fest!!

Thanks to everyone who voted and now we'll see how many can make it to Burlington.

It's a busy restaurant; they have a big parking lot but it does fill up (I think you can park next door at Barnes & Noble which also has a big parking lot).

We have a table reserved for 6 people at 7pm.........

I'll be there around 6:30-6:45.

Jon
617-519-4141
item.how_to_find_us: I'll reserve the table(s) under the name, "Jon/Golf Group"

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Chili's Restaurant
